description: Creates a new application that is the top-level node in a hierarchy of related cloud resource abstractions.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the application. The name must be unique in the region in which you are creating the application.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: Key-value pairs you can use to associate with the application. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier that you provide to ensure idempotency. If you retry a request that completed successfully using the same client token and the same parameters, the retry succeeds without performing any further actions. If you retry a successful request using the same client token, but one or more of the parameters are different, the retry fails. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) that specifies the application across services.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the application. The name must be unique in the region in which you are creating the application.

nested_items.name: creationTime
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 formatted timestamp of the moment when the application was created.

nested_items.name: lastUpdateTime
nested_items.description: The ISO-8601 formatted timestamp of the moment when the application was last updated.

nested_items.name: applicationTag
nested_items.description: A key-value pair that identifies an associated resource.
